text: Juan Pedro López Pérez (born 31 July 1997) is a Spanish cyclist, who currently rides for UCI WorldTeam . In October 2020, he was named in the startlist for the 2020 Vuelta a España. ==Major results== ;2018 : 7th Overall Giro della Valle d'Aosta ;2019 : 4th Overall Tour of Antalya : 6th Overall Tour de Hongrie : 9th Overall Giro della Valle d'Aosta ::1st Stage 4 ===Grand Tour general classification results timeline=== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" |- ! scope="col" | Grand Tour ! scope="col" | 2020 |- style="text-align:center;" ! scope="row" | alt=A pink jersey Giro d'Italia |— |- style="text-align:center;" ! scope="row" | alt=A yellow jersey Tour de France |— |- style="text-align:center;" ! scope="row" | alt=A red jersey Vuelta a España |IP |} {| class="wikitable" |+ Legend |- ! scope="row" | — | Did not compete |- ! scope="row" | DNF | Did not finish |} ==References== ==External links== * Category:1997 births Category:Living people Category:Spanish male cyclists Category:People from Lebrija Category:Vuelta a España cyclists
title: Juan Pedro López
